creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: female figure at L holding a large water pitcher, facing a male figure who is reaching for her opposite hand; camels and another man in background at L; wells by their feet; a town with a woman walking back from path at R
inscription: erased marks on verso, and two circle partially obscured by tape
provenance: [Kate Ganz, London; sold to Andrus]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
title: Design for Watch Case: Rebecca at the Well
